tool_description: Given an underlying price change, how much will your leveraged (ex: ETF) equity change?
name: Underlying Vs Theoretical Leveraged (ETF) Returns
title: Underlying Vs Theoretical Leveraged (ETF) Returns

api_list.name: Leveraged Equity Calculator
api_list.description: Given a leveraged value, change in an underlying asset price and a starting equity amount; calculate the projected equity amount.

api_list.name: Calculate ETF
api_list.description: Given a leverage value and an underlying asset percent change; returns the equity asset percent change.
